org.agilewiki.utils.immutable.collections

Interface Releasable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListNode, MapNode, VersionedListNode, VersionedMapNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockReference, ListNodeData, ListNodeImpl, ListReference, MapNodeData, MapNodeImpl, MapReference, VersionedListNodeData, VersionedListNodeImpl, VersionedListReference, VersionedMapNodeData, VersionedMapNodeImpl, VersionedMapReference

    public interface Releasable
    Immutables supporting the release and resize methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDurableLength()
      Returns the size of a byte array needed to serialize this object, including the space needed for the durable id.
      void releaseAll()
      release all resources.
      default void releaseLocal()
      release the local resources.
      default java.lang.Object resize(int maxSize, int maxBlockSize)
      Resize immutables which are too large.
      default java.lang.Object shrink()
      Creates a block reference from an immutable.

    • Method Detail

      • getDurableLength

        int getDurableLength()
        Returns the size of a byte array needed to serialize this object, including the space needed for the durable id.
        Returns:
        The size in bytes of the serialized data.

      • releaseAll

        void releaseAll()
        release all resources.

      • releaseLocal

        default void releaseLocal()
        release the local resources.

      • resize

        default java.lang.Object resize(int maxSize,
                                int maxBlockSize)
        Resize immutables which are too large.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Max size allowed for durable length.
        maxBlockSize - Maximum block size.
        Returns:
        The revised structure.

      • shrink

        default java.lang.Object shrink()
        Creates a block reference from an immutable. This method is only called on immutables that have a durable length that is not larger than the max block size.
        Returns:
        A block reference.
